callback_with_context.context_function_id: IsConvertingType == false && IsAbandoning == false && PrimarySlotContext.BuildingContext.BuildingLevelRecordContext.PrimarySlotBuildingLevelRequirement > 0 && PrimarySlotContext.BuildingContext.IsDamaged == false && SettlementType != "wh3_dlc27_dechala_war_pit" && SettlementType != "wh3_dlc27_dechala_pleasure_palace" && CanConvertToSettlementType("wh3_dlc27_dechala_war_pit")

dy_settlement_name.component_level_text: Montanhas da borda do mundo de Southlands

callback_with_context.context_function_id: (descending_nr = GetIfElse(ToNumber(self.GetProperty("descending")) == 1, 0, 1)) => Do( self.SetProperty("descending", descending_nr) , Component("list_box", "list_labour_provinces").SortChildren(descending_nr == 0, ToNumber(ChildContext("dy_efficiency").CurrentText)), SetPrefAsInt("labour_sort_order", 6), SetPrefAsBool("labour_sort_descending", descending_nr == 1), self.SetState(descending_nr == 1 | "selected_down" | "selected_up"))

(descending_nr = GetIfElse(ToNumber(self.GetProperty("descending")) == 1, 0, 1)) => Do( self.SetProperty("descending", descending_nr) , Component("list_box", "list_labour_provinces").SortChildren(descending_nr == 1, ToNumber(ChildContext("dy_growth").CurrentText)), SetPrefAsInt("labour_sort_order", 3), SetPrefAsBool("labour_sort_descending", descending_nr == 1), self.SetState(descending_nr == 1 | "selected_down" | "selected_up"))

(descending_nr = GetIfElse(ToNumber(self.GetProperty("descending")) == 1, 0, 1)) => Do( self.SetProperty("descending", descending_nr) , Component("list_box", "list_labour_provinces").SortChildren(descending_nr == 1, ChildContext("dy_province_name").CurrentText), SetPrefAsInt("labour_sort_order", 0), SetPrefAsBool("labour_sort_descending", descending_nr == 1), self.SetState(descending_nr == 1 | "selected_down" | "selected_up"))

(descending_nr = GetIfElse(ToNumber(self.GetProperty("descending")) == 1, 0, 1)) => Do( self.SetProperty("descending", descending_nr) , Component("list_box", "list_labour_provinces").SortChildren(descending_nr == 1, ToNumber(ChildContext("dy_raw_materials").CurrentText)), SetPrefAsInt("labour_sort_order", 7), SetPrefAsBool("labour_sort_descending", descending_nr == 1), self.SetState(descending_nr == 1 | "selected_down" | "selected_up"))
